channel.title: Dodgy ethernet cable repair
channel.description:
Well, I got annoyed at my server not being online due to a cut cable. I also got bored of waiting for a new cable. So, I picked up a lighter and burned 1cm off each little wire (gets rid of insulation) then twisted them to their corrosponding colours.
It actually worked :D I lost the picture of before, but here it is now: (You are downloading this image through the repaired cable.
[img]http://203.96.219.52/cable.jpg[/img]
The speed dropped from 100mbits to 2.6mbits.
